document_data.caption: A ''ring of enduring arcana'' (center).
document_data.name: Ring of Enduring Arcana
document_data.mainbody: A '''''ring of enduring arcana''''' was a magical [[ring]] that rendered a spellcaster's [[spell]]s more resistant to [[dispelling]]. They were favored by [[mage]]s facing rivals of similar might.
document_data.Creation: To forge a ''ring of enduring arcana'', a spellcaster must have ''[[dispel magic]]'' available.
document_data.Description: A ''ring of enduring arcana'' was a fine latticework of [[gold]] and [[mithral]] that covers most of the length of the wearer's finger, with a joint in the middle to allow movement. It appeared to shift and flow whenever the wearer cast a spell.
document_data.Activation: A ''ring of enduring arcana'' was permanently active for as long as it was worn.  However, it did require 24 hours to acclimate to the wearer, starting when it was donned.
